Text:
For more movies/music and files like this, check out my other torrents at:

http://thepiratebay.org/user/lkobescak

THANKS SO MUCH FOR THIS!
 Amazing footage and its really opened up my mind to where these crop circles must be coming from.. and it certainly isnt from around here.. ;)
I am seeding it no problem!

Good quality: V: 8 A: 8 There are a couple of glitches early on where the film pixilates for a few seconds, and the sound is slightly out of sinc - but only in the beginning of the movie, and it might have been a problem specific to my DL. (Someone seeding might have an incomplete version - have had this happen before.) But I'm not going to bother re-downloading... it's so good I'm going to buy it.

This is one of the best documentaries on crop circles I've seen... I decided to purchase the DVD from amazon to support the filmmaker and because I want to see the "extras" which the reviewers  on Amazon say are as good as the movie.

 FYI: I found a 2-disc set that was just released by UFOTV. It costs a little more but I figured the extra DVD might be worth it.

Thanks again Ikobesak -- will check out your other uploads!
